info.title: Backend Apis
info.description: API documentation for managing hotel booking requirement

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Also provide token by clicking the lock icon in the header and provide token in modal input like this: 'Bearer {token}'

get.summary: Get monthly tax report by date
Get monthly sales report by date

get.description: Retrieves the summary report for the specified date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the summary report (e.g., '2023-05-25')

get.description: Retrieves the available rooms for the specified date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve available rooms (e.g., '2023-05-25')

get.description: Retrieve bookings based on the provided date

status.description: Indicates the success status of the response

totalArrivals.description: Total number of arrivals for the provided date

totalDeparture.description: Total number of departures for the provided date

totalAccommodationBooked.description: Total number of accommodations booked for the provided date

get.description: Retrieve monthly bookings based on the provided date

status.description: Indicates the success status of the response

totalArrivals.description: Total number of arrivals for the provided date

totalDeparture.description: Total number of departures for the provided date

totalAccommodationBooked.description: Total number of accommodations booked for the provided date

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the booking to delete

value.message: Id passed does not exist or already deleted

get.description: Retrieves a user by the provided ID

firstName.description: The first name of the user

lastName.description: The last name of the user

emailAddress.description: The email address of the user

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the user

zipcode.description: The zipcode of the billing address

address1.description: The first line of the billing address

address2.description: The second line of the billing address

city.description: The city of the billing address

state.description: The state of the billing address

emailAddress.description: The email address associated with the billing address

get.summary: Check revenue growth for the past 14 days (monthly)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the plan to be deleted
